recipes.title: Spicy Sausage and Vegetable Stir-Fry
steps: Heat a large skillet over medium-high heat and add the sausage. Cook until browned and then remove from skillet.
Add the bell peppers, onion, and garlic to the skillet and stir-fry for 5 minutes.
In a small bowl, mix together the soy sauce, brown sugar, and sesame oil. Pour this mixture into the skillet and stir-fry for an additional 2-3 minutes.
Add the cooked sausage back into the skillet and stir to combine. Serve over rice or noodles.

recipes.title: Classic Beef Stroganoff
ingredients: 1 pound beef sirloin, sliced into thin strips
steps: Melt the butter in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Add the beef and cook until browned. Remove from skillet and set aside.
Add the onion, mushrooms, and garlic to the skillet and cook until softened. Sprinkle the flour over the vegetables and stir to combine.
Add the beef broth and stir until thickened. Stir in the sour cream and parsley. Add the beef back into the skillet and stir to combine. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve over egg noodles or rice.

recipes.title: Lemon Herb Grilled Chicken
steps: In a large bowl, mix together the lemon juice, olive oil, garlic, thyme, basil, oregano, salt and pepper.
Add the chicken to the bowl and toss to coat with the marinade. Cover and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes or up to 2 hours.
Preheat a grill to medium-high heat. Grill the chicken for 6-8 minutes per side, or until cooked through.
Serve immediately.

recipes.title: Creamy Tomato and Spinach Pasta
steps: Cook the pasta according to package instructions and then drain.
Heat the olive oil in a large skillet over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until softened.
Add the diced tomatoes and cream to the skillet and stir to combine. Bring to a simmer and then reduce heat to low.
Add the cooked pasta and Parmesan cheese to the skillet and stir until well combined.
Add the spinach and stir until it wilts. Serve immediately, garnished with additional Parmesan cheese and fresh basil if desired.

recipes.title: Shrimp and Grits
steps: In a large pot, bring the chicken broth to a boil. Slowly stir in the grits and reduce heat to low. Cook for 20-25 minutes, or until thickened. Stir in the cream, Parmesan cheese, and butter.
In a separate skillet, heat the olive oil over medium-high heat. Add the onion and garlic and cook until softened. Add the shrimp and cook until pink and opaque. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Serve the shrimp over the grits and garnish with additional Parmesan cheese and green onions.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter, sugar, and brown sugar until light and fluffy. Beat in the eggs, one at a time, followed by the vanilla extract.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, baking powder, baking soda, and salt. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the butter mixture and stir until well combined.
Fold in the chocolate chips and drop spoonfuls of dough onto the prepared baking sheet. Bake for 12-15 minutes, or until golden brown.
Remove from oven and let cool on the baking sheet for 5 minutes before transferring to a wire rack to cool completely.
